recipe.title: Mac & Cheese By Terry Crews (Mack And Jeezy) Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups ; cream-style cottage cheese, or small curd ; (450 g)
2 cups ; sharp cheddar cheese, shredded ; (200 g)

steps.step: Cook macaroni “al dente” according to package directions. Drain with cold water.
In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cheese, sour cream, egg, and salt. Fold in macaroni.
Grease a 2-quart (2 liters) casserole dish with coconut oil.
Spoon mixture into casserole dish and sprinkle with extra cheese and paprika.
